speaker.description: Audio output device for Alfred's voice. Run 'mpv --audio-device=help' to list. macOS format: 'coreaudio/DEVICE-ID:output'. Windows format: 'wasapi/DEVICE-NAME'. Set to null for system default.

microphone.description: Microphone device index for voice input. Run 'python -c "import sounddevice; print(sounddevice.query_devices())"' to list. Set to null for system default.
